# Useful links

## Videos

Below are some useful videos to learn about `Julia`:

- [Intro to Julia tutorial (version 1.0) by Jane Herriman](https://youtu.be/8h8rQyEpiZA)

  Introductory notebooks to `Julia`.
  
- [The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Multiple Dispatch](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kc9HwsxE1OY)

  More details on one of the strong points of `Julia` : "multiple dispatch".
